comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: you guys ride in this crappy weather??? Me thinks it is skiing weather.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Dennis, when the roads are (mostly) dry, we ride. Those of us who have yet to retire, ski on the weekends. Hope you're well!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Dunno about the skiing, actually. We were on the Heart Lake trail Sunday and people were fighting over the few remaining little bits of snow that were left over from November. I hear the Forest Service is going to a lottery system if things don't improve soon. DU

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: since I have time on my hands perhaps I'll put a fix in on the lottery. You know in the old days I could hack....

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Please give it a shot, Dennis. I particularly like that one snowbank in the little meadow just above the Forest Lakes turnoff. Would like to ski it the weekend of February thirteenth... if there's anything left. Thanks for your help with this. I take back everything I ever said about retirees. DU
